mapper.update: delete from biz_outstock_packmaterial a INNER JOIN ( select waybill_no from biz_outstock_packmaterial where customer_id=#{customerId} and create_time>=#{beginTime} and create_time< #{endTime} and del_flag='0' and source in ('import','system') GROUP BY waybill_no having FIND_IN_SET('import',GROUP_CONCAT(source))>0 and FIND_IN_SET('system',GROUP_CONCAT(source))>0 ) b on a.waybill_no=b.waybill_no where a.source='import' and a.del_flag='0'
